intro: Aim, splash, and paint the board with colorful cubes for fun and accuracy!
description: Splatter Blocks is a vibrant, fun-filled game where precision meets creativity! Launch adorable cube characters from a springboard into a pool of paint, then splash onto the board to color in the picture. Aim carefully to match the correct colors and fill in the corresponding squares. The more accurate your painting, the higher your score! Master each level with perfect splashes and unlock new challenges. Simple, stylish, and bursting with character—get ready to paint the town!
